subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: After months of haggling, Alberto Contador, king of the bicycle world, appears to be rejoining the Astana team. But his agent and brother denies talk of an eye-popping $12-million contract.
snippet: After months of haggling, Alberto Contador, king of the bicycle world, appears to be rejoining the Astana team. But his agent and brother denies talk of an eye-popping $12-million contract.
